page.title: 03CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: { Most people from the age of seven go to clubs. Twenty-five out of twenty-nine in our class(class 1) attend to clubs. The most popular clubs are swimming,guides and cubs. Some people go to more than one club. One person in our class does bell-ringing at the local church. Most girls in class two go to ballet and the boys go to cubs. Wives group uses the Victory Hall in Kenton as a meeting place. The keep fit club fountain club,the playgroup and the toddlers group also use the Victory Hall. There is a commitee who look after this hall and organize fund raising events to maintain the building.
